db:abstract.db:para: Transforming video and camera viewfinder content.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = qmlvideo
QT += quick multimedia
LOCAL_SOURCES = main.cpp LOCAL_HEADERS = trace.h
SOURCES += $$LOCAL_SOURCES HEADERS += $$LOCAL_HEADERS RESOURCES += qmlvideo.qrc
SNIPPETS_PATH = ../snippets include($$SNIPPETS_PATH/performancemonitor/performancemonitordeclarative.pri)
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/multimedia/video/qmlvideo INSTALLS += target
EXAMPLE_FILES += \ qmlvideo.png \ qmlvideo.svg
